name: Goldman
description:
My name is Kevin Benavides and I did the level design and very few assets for Goldman. Other than Goldman, the Monkey, and the Helicopter, the other art assets are from GrottoEscape2 by Ansimuz from the Unity Asset Store.

Goldman is a game about a treasure hunter of the same name who has been down on his luck lately. He gained a few pounds, but decided that one last venture couldn't hurt. Luckily for him, it might be the last venture he ever needs because he found the abandoned ruins of the Golden Monkey. 

Players take control of Goldman and play through his experience of the abandoned ruins. The story begins with his arrival to the ruins and the player plays through 5 levels of Goldman's adventure, beginning to end. Can you claim the lost treasure?

Notable mechanics include water spouts (for high jumps), mobile stone heads, and magic stones that move when you move their partners. Dive in for an adventure with Goldman!
